content:
Imagine you are a robot browsing the web, just like humans. Now you need to complete a task. In each iteration, you will receive an Observation that includes a screenshot of a webpage and some texts. This screenshot will feature Numerical Labels placed in the TOP LEFT corner of each Web Element.
Carefully analyze the visual information to identify the Numerical Label corresponding to the Web Element that requires interaction, then follow the guidelines and choose one of the following actions:
1. Click a Web Element.
2. Delete existing content in a textbox and then type content. 
3. Scroll up or down. Multiple scrolls are allowed to browse the webpage. Pay attention!! The default scroll is the whole window. If the scroll widget is located in a certain area of the webpage, then you have to specify a Web Element in that area. I would hover the mouse there and then scroll.
4. Wait. Typically used to wait for unfinished webpage processes, with a duration of 5 seconds.
5. Go back, returning to the previous webpage.
6. Google, directly jump to the Google search page. When you can't find information in some websites, try starting over with Google.
7. Answer. This action should only be chosen when all questions in the task have been solved.

Correspondingly, Action should STRICTLY follow the format:
- Click [Numerical_Label]
- Type [Numerical_Label]; [Content]
- Scroll [Numerical_Label or WINDOW]; [up or down]
- Wait
- GoBack
- Google
- ANSWER; [content]

Key Guidelines You MUST follow:
* Action guidelines *
1) To input text, NO need to click textbox first, directly type content. After typing, the system automatically hits `ENTER` key. Sometimes you should click the search button to apply search filters. Try to use simple language when searching.  
2) You must Distinguish between textbox and search button, don't type content into the button! If no textbox is found, you may need to click the search button first before the textbox is displayed. 
3) Execute only one action per iteration. 
4) STRICTLY Avoid repeating the same action if the webpage remains unchanged. You may have selected the wrong web element or numerical label. Continuous use of the Wait is also NOT allowed.
5) When a complex Task involves multiple questions or steps, select "ANSWER" only at the very end, after addressing all of these questions (steps). Flexibly combine your own abilities with the information in the web page. Double check the formatting requirements in the task when ANSWER. 
* Web Browsing Guidelines *
1) Don't interact with useless web elements like Login, Sign-in, donation that appear in Webpages. Pay attention to Key Web Elements like search textbox and menu.
2) Vsit video websites like YouTube is allowed BUT you can't play videos. Clicking to download PDF is allowed and will be analyzed by the Assistant API.
3) Focus on the numerical labels in the TOP LEFT corner of each rectangle (element). Ensure you don't mix them up with other numbers (e.g. Calendar) on the page.
4) Focus on the date in task, you must look for results that match the date. It may be necessary to find the correct year, month and day at calendar.
5) Pay attention to the filter and sort functions on the page, which, combined with scroll, can help you solve conditions like 'highest', 'cheapest', 'lowest', 'earliest', etc. Try your best to find the answer that best fits the task.
6) When you've stay in the same page and interact with the same element for two continuous iterations, you should consider to change to other possible action.
* Reply guidelines *
1) There is a reviewer who is going to judge your thought and action for making the feasibility higher, when you receive the response from reviewer, you should re-think your thought and action according to the judgement.
2) If user providing Reviewer_thought to you, you should re-think your thought and action according to the information in Reviewer_thought.

Your reply should strictly follow the format:
Thought: {Your brief thoughts (briefly summarize the info that will help ANSWER)}
Action: {One Action format you choose}

Then the User will provide:
Observation: {A labeled screenshot Given by User}
Reviewer_thought: {[Optional]Your original_reply and the judgement from reviewer base on your original_reply}

Now given a task: find the song which is the most popular in this week.  Please interact with https://streetvoice.com/ and get the answer.Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: To find the most popular song this week on StreetVoice, I need to click the "排行榜" (Ranking) element, which likely contains the chart of popular songs. This element is indicated by numerical label [2].

Action: Click 2

Reviewer_thought:Opinion: Feasible. Clicking on the "排行榜" (Ranking) element with the numerical label [2] is a logical action towards finding the most popular song this week on StreetVoice. Proceed with this action.
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: The current ranking section shows the most popular songs, with "ERASER" at the top position. To confirm this information, I need to click the "週排行" (Weekly Ranking) element, which appears to be labeled [26], to ensure I am looking at the weekly popular songs.

Action: Click 26
Reviewer_thought:Opinion: Feasible. You can proceed with the action of clicking the "週排行" (Weekly Ranking) element labeled [26] to confirm the information about the current top-ranked songs.
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: The screenshot shows the current weekly ranking for music on StreetVoice for the week of March 10 to March 16, 2025. The most popular song appears to be "ERASER" based on its position in the list. To confirm the most popular song of the week, I need to interact with the "週排行" element, which is labeled [26].

Action: Click 26

Reviewer_thought:Opinion: Not Feasible. The action to click [26] (週排行) is not advisable because you need to confirm the most popular song, but clicking this element does not directly provide that confirmation. Instead, you should consider clicking on the button associated with the most popular song to gather more information. Please GOBACK and check the elements that appear connected to song selections or interactions, like [13] (島 SHIMA（Demo）) or [14] (OBSESS).
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: The image shows the current weekly ranking of songs on StreetVoice with "愛妳是" by "soby" at the top position for the week of March 10 to March 16, 2025. To gather more information about this song, I will interact with the song title "愛妳是" (labeled [30]) to get details about it.

Action: Click 30
Reviewer_thought:Opinion: Feasible. You can proceed with your action to click on the song title "愛妳是" labeled [30] to gather more information about it.
Observation: A screenshot and some texts. (Omitted in context.)

Thought: The screenshot provides information about the song "愛妳是" by "soby," which is currently ranked as a popular song. It shows significant engagement, including 80,599 plays and 1,525 likes. To gather more detailed information, such as the introduction or other relevant data, I will click on the "查看更多" button, which may provide further insights about the song or artist.

Action: Click 35

Reviewer_thought:Opinion: Not Feasible. While clicking the "查看更多" (View More) button (35) seems like a reasonable step to gather more information, it may end up leading you to an area of the website that does not help achieve your main objective. As a precaution, I recommend going back and exploring other options first or ensuring this button is indeed the most relevant option for your purpose before proceeding. Please reconsider your action and either GoBack or choose another element to interact with.

content.text:
Observation: please analyze the attached screenshot and give the Thought and Action. I've provided the tag name of each element and the text it contains (if text exists). Note that <textarea> or <input> may be textbox, but not exactly. Please focus more on the screenshot and then refer to the textual information.
[0]: "StreetVoice";	[1]: "發現";	[2]: "排行榜";	[3]: "歌單";	[4]: "徵選";	[5]: "演出活動";	[6]: "App";	[7]: "音樂人指南";	[11]: "登入 / 註冊";	[13]: "島 SHIMA（Demo）";	[14]: "OBSESS";	[15]: <button> "";	[18]: <button> "";	[19]: <button> "";	[20]: <button> "";	[21]: <button> "";	[22]: <button> "";	[24]: "Hip hop / Rap";	[25]: "播放次數 80,599";	[26]: "1,525";	[28]: <button> "";	[29]: <button> "1.5k";	[30]: <button> "";	[31]: "ソビ soby";	[32]: "＋ 追蹤";	[33]: <button> "好喔", "Close";	[34]: "https://youtu.be/orZdl3KqgzU?si=h5EgyT3rZLpAyj9X";

content:
Thought: The screenshot shows that "愛妳是" by "soby" is currently the most popular song with significant play counts (80,599) and likes (1,525). The description and information about the song are included, which can provide additional context. To fulfill the task of identifying the most popular song for the week, I should summarize that "愛妳是" is the song I'm looking for, as all indications confirm its popularity and engagement metrics.

Action: ANSWER; The most popular song this week is "愛妳是" by "soby."
